page.title: 13ATTITUDES IN CHERINGTON
page.content:
This part of the South Cotswolds is a beautiful area to live in, and lots of well-known people live in the nearby. Princess Anne and her husband, Captain Mark Phillips, live at Gatcombe Park. We think that the old-styled houses should be kept in the villages instead of putting up new estates. There is a lack of things to do in the evenings and during holiday times. There are not many restaurants in the area either. In the villages there is a lack of parking spaces, especially when tourists come to visit.
{Contributed by a class of 9 and 10 {year-olds.}
